entry.title: Marvel Goes Full CRINGE | Disney is DOOMED

media:group.media:title: Marvel Goes Full CRINGE | Disney is DOOMED
media:group.media:description:
The Wakanda Forever Clips look TERRIBLE. Disney Marvel's M-She-U Phase Bore ends with the Black Panther sequel, that has the supporting cast vs. a heavily retconned Namor who can't even pronounce his own name. After watching the aforementioned 4 clips, the ones Disney Marvel deliberately picked out to sell this movie, cringe is the only word to describe them. The winds of change are starting to blow. Unfortunately, the more things change, the more Disney stays the same. Too much bad content will lead to apathy, the franchise killer. #wakandaforever #disney #marvel

media:group.media:title: The Rings of Power - An Unmitigated DISASTER

entry.title: The Rings of Power: D.O.A. | Criticizing Amazon's DISASTER Is a Threat to Our Democracy?

media:group.media:title: The Rings of Power: D.O.A. | Criticizing Amazon's DISASTER Is a Threat to Our Democracy?
media:group.media:description:
Amazon's ABOMINATION known as The Rings of Power has been a MASSIVE loss for the corporation. How much? Time will tell. It has also been the frontlines of the Pop Culture War of late. Delivering a catastrophic loss to the activist Access Media. The damage control and cope has just begun. The good news is we won't see a season 2 for over 2 years. By then, this show will be lost in the void. In this video we cover the single worst defense of this show since it was announced. #theringsofpower #LOTRonPrime #Amazon
